item.title: Frost introduces the Thailand Excellence Awards
item.description: Frost & Sullivan, a global business growth consulting firm, granted 28 Thailand Excellence Awards to companies that exhibited remarkable accomplishments and exceptional performance across various sectors. Koh Eng Lok, Country Head of Thailand at Frost & Sullivan, highlighted the recipients’ dedication to their clients. He explained that the award categories are carefully chosen each year to represent the prevailing market trends and encompass both established and emerging segments. The sectors range from ICT, automotive, energy & power, healthcare, building technologies to chemicals and palm oil.

item.title: HungryGoWhere is collecting votes for its inaugural foodie awards
item.description: The inaugural HungryGoWhere Awards voting period has opened. The food review platform HungryGoWhere revealed that public votes will solely decide the 26 award recipients. Those interested in voting have until February 4th to cast their ballots on the awards website. The awards span five categories: Restaurants, Hawkers, Drinks, Occasions, and Best of the Best. After the voting period ends, participants will be entered into a lucky draw.
